name: d2l-button
description: Polymer-based web components and Sass mixins for D2L buttons

scripts.dump: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:local:dump"
scripts.galen:sauce:run: sc-run -- d2l-galen test test/acceptance/button.test.js -g factory:sauce -s -i SAUCE_USERNAME SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER -- -p4
scripts.lint: npm run lint:wc && npm run lint:html
scripts.lint:wc: polymer lint -i d2l-button.html d2l-floating-buttons.html d2l-button-subtle.html d2l-button-icon.html
scripts.test:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:sauce: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:sauce:run"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:polymer:local && npm run test:galen:local

author: D2L Corporation
